chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Best regards,
today we got to unwrap our daughter's phone while we discovered that a wrong charging cable was included, see photo!
It's actually a USB-C on Apple Lightning, we only have adapters with normal USB connections not USB-C.
Please send us the correct charging cable!
Best regards 
Frank Dargel

1 Photo - wrong charging cable
2 Photo our adapter

Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

the customer has received the wrong cable please send the customer the correct cable

Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer.

We are truly sorry that we are still not able to provide you with a satisfactory outcome, hence, we would like to offer you a 10 euros commercial gesture. With this commercial gesture, you can use this amount to purchase a new charging cable. This helps reduce the harmful carbon dioxide emissions produced by logistics carriers when shipping an item.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

send the 10 euro.


Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the commercial gesture.

Regards,
JY
